channel.title: Replicatedctl on Replicated Help Center
channel.description: Recent content in Replicatedctl on Replicated Help Center

item.title: replicatedctl app
item.description: replicatedctl app Manage apps Synopsis Manage apps Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl app inspect - Display detailed information on the app replicatedctl app start - Start the app replicatedctl app status - Manage the app status replicatedctl app stop - Stop the app

item.title: replicatedctl app inspect
item.description: replicatedctl app inspect Display detailed information on the app Synopsis Display detailed information on the app replicatedctl app inspect Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app - Manage apps

item.title: replicatedctl app start
item.description: replicatedctl app start Start the app Synopsis Start the app replicatedctl app start Options -a, --attach Attach to task -q, --quiet Only display task ID --raw Raw JSON stream --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app - Manage apps

item.title: replicatedctl app status
item.description: replicatedctl app status Manage the app status Synopsis Manage the app status Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app - Manage apps replicatedctl app status inspect - Display detailed information on the app’s status

item.title: replicatedctl app status inspect
item.description: replicatedctl app status inspect Display detailed information on the app’s status Synopsis Display detailed information on the app’s status replicatedctl app status inspect Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app status - Manage the app status

item.title: replicatedctl app stop
item.description: replicatedctl app stop Stop the app Synopsis Stop the app replicatedctl app stop Options -a, --attach Attach to task -f, --force Force stop -q, --quiet Only display task ID --raw Raw JSON stream --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app - Manage apps

item.title: replicatedctl app-config
item.description: replicatedctl app-config Manage app config Synopsis Manage app config Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl app-config export - Export app config settings replicatedctl app-config import - Import app config settings from stdin replicatedctl app-config set - Sets an individual app config value replicatedctl app-config view - View app config form

item.title: replicatedctl app-config export
item.description: replicatedctl app-config export Export app config settings Synopsis Export app config settings replicatedctl app-config export Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-config - Manage app config

item.title: replicatedctl app-config import
item.description: replicatedctl app-config import Import app config settings from stdin Synopsis Import app config settings from stdin replicatedctl app-config import Options --format string Input format. One of: json|yaml (default "json") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-config - Manage app config

item.title: replicatedctl app-config set
item.description: replicatedctl app-config set Sets an individual app config value Synopsis Sets an individual app config value replicatedctl app-config set NAME Options --data stringSlice Sets the item data --value stringSlice Sets the item value Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-config - Manage app config

item.title: replicatedctl app-config view
item.description: replicatedctl app-config view View app config form Synopsis View app config form replicatedctl app-config view Options --group string Config group to filter by -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml -q, --quiet Only display IDs --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-config - Manage app config

item.title: replicatedctl app-release
item.description: replicatedctl app-release Manage app releases Synopsis Manage app releases Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl app-release apply - Applies pending app releases replicatedctl app-release inspect - Display detailed information on one or more app releases replicatedctl app-release ls - List app releases replicatedctl app-release notes - Display release notes for an app releases

item.title: replicatedctl app-release apply
item.description: replicatedctl app-release apply Applies pending app releases Synopsis Applies pending app releases replicatedctl app-release apply Options -a, --attach Attach to task -q, --quiet Only display task ID --raw Raw JSON stream --sequence int Apply releases up to and including specified sequence (0 for all) --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.

item.title: replicatedctl app-release inspect
item.description: replicatedctl app-release inspect Display detailed information on one or more app releases Synopsis Display detailed information on one or more app releases replicatedctl app-release inspect SEQUENCE [SEQUENCE...] Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-release - Manage app releases

item.title: replicatedctl app-release ls
item.description: replicatedctl app-release ls List app releases Synopsis List app releases replicatedctl app-release ls Options --all Display all app releases --fetch Fetch releases form Market API -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --pending Display only pending app releases -q, --quiet Only display IDs --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.

item.title: replicatedctl app-release notes
item.description: replicatedctl app-release notes Display release notes for an app releases Synopsis Display release notes for an app releases replicatedctl app-release notes SEQUENCE Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl app-release - Manage app releases

item.title: replicatedctl console-auth
item.description: replicatedctl console-auth Manage UI console authentication settings Synopsis Manage UI console authentication settings Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl console-auth export - Export console auth config for current auth type replicatedctl console-auth import - Import console authentication config from stdin replicatedctl console-auth reset - Resets console authentication to type anonymous

item.title: replicatedctl console-auth export
item.description: replicatedctl console-auth export Export console auth config for current auth type Synopsis Export console auth config for current auth type replicatedctl console-auth export Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template --type string Get configuration for auth type (one of anonymous, password, ldap) Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.

item.title: replicatedctl console-auth import
item.description: replicatedctl console-auth import Import console authentication config from stdin Synopsis Import console authentication config from stdin replicatedctl console-auth import Options --format string Input format. One of: json|yaml (default "json") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl console-auth - Manage UI console authentication settings

item.title: replicatedctl console-auth reset
item.description: replicatedctl console-auth reset Resets console authentication to type anonymous Synopsis Resets console authentication to type anonymous replicatedctl console-auth reset Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl console-auth - Manage UI console authentication settings

item.title: replicatedctl license
item.description: replicatedctl license Manage the license Synopsis Manage the license Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl license activate - Activate the license replicatedctl license inspect - Display detailed information on the license

item.title: replicatedctl license activate
item.description: replicatedctl license activate Activate the license Synopsis Activate the license replicatedctl license activate CODE Options -a, --attach Attach to task -q, --quiet Only display task ID --raw Raw JSON stream --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl license - Manage the license

item.title: replicatedctl license inspect
item.description: replicatedctl license inspect Display detailed information on the license Synopsis Display detailed information on the license replicatedctl license inspect Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --sync Sync license --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl license - Manage the license

item.title: replicatedctl license-load
item.description: replicatedctl license-load Load the license from stdin Synopsis Load the license from stdin replicatedctl license-load Options -a, --attach Attach to task -q, --quiet Only display task ID --raw Raw JSON stream --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI

item.title: replicatedctl params
item.description: replicatedctl params Manage params Synopsis Manage params Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl params export - Export params replicatedctl params import - Import params from stdin replicatedctl params set - Sets an individual param value replicatedctl params unset - Unsets a runtime overridden param value

item.title: replicatedctl params export
item.description: replicatedctl params export Export params Synopsis Export params replicatedctl params export Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl params - Manage params

item.title: replicatedctl params import
item.description: replicatedctl params import Import params from stdin Synopsis Import params from stdin replicatedctl params import Options --format string Input format. One of: json|yaml (default "json") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl params - Manage params

item.title: replicatedctl params set
item.description: replicatedctl params set Sets an individual param value Synopsis Sets an individual param value replicatedctl params set KEY Options --value string Sets the param value Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl params - Manage params

item.title: replicatedctl params unset
item.description: replicatedctl params unset Unsets a runtime overridden param value Synopsis Unsets a runtime overridden param value replicatedctl params unset KEY Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl params - Manage params

item.title: replicatedctl preflight
item.description: replicatedctl preflight View or manage preflight checks Synopsis View or manage preflight checks Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl preflight dismiss - Dismiss preflight check warnings replicatedctl preflight run - Run the preflight checks replicatedctl preflight status - Get preflight status

item.title: replicatedctl preflight dismiss
item.description: replicatedctl preflight dismiss Dismiss preflight check warnings Synopsis Dismiss preflight check warnings replicatedctl preflight dismiss Options --checksum string Preflight checksum -f, --force Force dismiss checks --sequence string App sequence (default "current") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl preflight - View or manage preflight checks

item.title: replicatedctl preflight run
item.description: replicatedctl preflight run Run the preflight checks Synopsis Run the preflight checks replicatedctl preflight run Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml -q, --quiet Only display checksum --sequence string App sequence (default "current") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl preflight - View or manage preflight checks

item.title: replicatedctl preflight status
item.description: replicatedctl preflight status Get preflight status Synopsis Get preflight status replicatedctl preflight status Options -q, --quiet Display true or false --sequence string App sequence (default "current") Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl preflight - View or manage preflight checks

item.title: replicatedctl snapshot
item.description: replicatedctl snapshot Manage snapshots Synopsis Manage snapshots Options --path string Snapshot location path. The value should be an absolute path. This option is only used with local and sftp backends. --s3-bucket string S3 bucket name. This option is only used with s3 backend. --s3-key-id string ID of the secret key that has write access to the specified S3 bucket. This option is only used with s3 backend. --s3-region string S3 bucket region.

item.title: replicatedctl snapshot ls
item.description: replicatedctl snapshot ls List snapshots Synopsis List snapshots replicatedctl snapshot ls Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml -q, --quiet Only display IDs --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") --path string Snapshot location path. The value should be an absolute path. This option is only used with local and sftp backends.

item.title: replicatedctl snapshot restore
item.description: replicatedctl snapshot restore Restore installation from the specified spanshot Synopsis Restore installation from the specified spanshot replicatedctl snapshot restore ID Options --dismiss-preflight-checks Dismiss preflight checks --id string Snapshot ID --node-timeout int Number of seconds to wait for nodes to connect (default 60) Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") --path string Snapshot location path. The value should be an absolute path.

item.title: replicatedctl snapshot start
item.description: replicatedctl snapshot start Start a snapshot Synopsis Start a snapshot replicatedctl snapshot start Options --exclude-app-data Only backup Replicated data and exclude app data --wait Block until snapshot is complete Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") --path string Snapshot location path. The value should be an absolute path. This option is only used with local and sftp backends. --s3-bucket string S3 bucket name.

item.title: replicatedctl support-bundle
item.description: replicatedctl support-bundle Generate a support bundle Synopsis Generate a support bundle replicatedctl support-bundle Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI

item.title: replicatedctl task
item.description: replicatedctl task Manage tasks Synopsis Manage tasks Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI replicatedctl task attach - Stream task progress replicatedctl task inspect - Display detailed information on one or more tasks replicatedctl task ls - List tasks

item.title: replicatedctl task attach
item.description: replicatedctl task attach Stream task progress Synopsis Stream task progress replicatedctl task attach ID Options -q, --quiet Suppress stdout --raw Raw JSON stream --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl task - Manage tasks

item.title: replicatedctl task inspect
item.description: replicatedctl task inspect Display detailed information on one or more tasks Synopsis Display detailed information on one or more tasks replicatedctl task inspect ID [ID...] Options -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl task - Manage tasks

item.title: replicatedctl task ls
item.description: replicatedctl task ls List tasks Synopsis List tasks replicatedctl task ls Options --all Display all tasks -o, --output string Output format. One of: json|yaml -q, --quiet Only display IDs --template string Format the output using the given Go template Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl task - Manage tasks

item.title: replicatedctl version
item.description: replicatedctl version Get the Replicated CLI version information Synopsis Get the Replicated CLI version information replicatedctl version Options --quiet Only print the version Options inherited from parent commands --host string Replicated API host (default "unix:///var/run/replicated/replicated-cli.sock") SEE ALSO replicatedctl - Replicated CLI
